description: Calientes Café is a Peruvian coffee brand dedicated to producing and selling coffee sourced from the Amazon rainforest. Founded by two partners, the initiative emphasizes environmental conservation and fair trade practices, ensuring that local producers receive fair prices. Their unique offerings include specialty coffees named after local wildlife, highlighting biodiversity. With a commitment to sustainability, they aim to foster a deeper connection between consumers and the Amazon while promoting the cultural significance of coffee.
name: Calientes Café
